snippet.title: Mega Man Legacy Collection - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Featuring faithful reproductions of the series’ origins with the original six Mega Man games, the Legacy Collection will remind long-time fans and introduce newcomers to what made Mega Man such a popular and iconic character.

"Challenge Mode" remixes gameplay segments from all six games, with plenty of scaling difficulty objectives for experienced players to conquer, yet serving as a good starting point for new players.

Museum Mode contains a comprehensive collection of history and high-res art – including promo art that may be new to even the most devout fans! 

MMLC will feature all six games and more for $14.99 this summer as a digital download on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC, and this winter on Nintendo 3DS.

Like the music track? It's "Searing Scissors" from OverClocked ReMix's official album! http://mm25.ocremix.org/
